dom_changes.description: Page title changed from 'Product Details' to 'Product - Wireless Headphones Pro'.
Product name changed from 'Wireless Headphones' to 'Wireless Headphones Pro'.
Product price changed from '$99.99' to '$79.99' (sale price).
Product description updated with additional features (battery life).
Stock status changed from 'In Stock' to 'Only 3 left in stock!' with warning icon.
New 'HOT DEAL' badge added above product image.
New rating section added with 5 stars and review count.
Original price with strikethrough added to show discount.
New 'Add to Wishlist' button added below main CTA.
Button text changed from 'Add to Cart' to 'Buy Now'.
Button style changed from solid green to gradient purple with rounded pill shape.
Product card border-radius increased from 8px to 12px.
Product image background changed from gray to purple gradient.
Price color changed from dark (#333) to red (#ff6b6b).
Card width increased from 300px to 320px with more padding.

test_impact_analysis: Any test using selector '#add-to-cart' will fail because the ID changed to '#buy-now-btn'.
Tests asserting button text 'Add to Cart' will fail — now reads 'Buy Now'.
Tests checking product price '$99.99' will fail — price is now '$79.99'.
Tests asserting 'In Stock' status text will fail due to changed stock messaging.
Visual regression tests will detect significant UI changes: new badge, rating, gradient backgrounds, pill-shaped buttons.
Tests verifying only one CTA button will fail — there are now two buttons (Buy Now + Wishlist).
new_tests_recommended: Add test to verify 'HOT DEAL' badge is visible when product is on sale.
Add test to verify original price is displayed with strikethrough when discounted.
Add test to verify star rating and review count are displayed.
Add test for 'Add to Wishlist' button functionality.
Add test to verify low-stock warning appears when inventory is below threshold.
Update existing 'add to cart' test to use '#buy-now-btn' selector.
Add visual regression test for new gradient button and card styling.
